Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients undergo leukapheresis obtain leukocyte generation autologous dendritic cell ( DC ) . Patients receive autologous DC load vaccinia-CEA-MUC-1-TRICOM ( PANVAC-V ) vaccine subcutaneously ( SC ) intradermally ( ID ) day 1 autologous DC load fowlpox-CEA-MUC-1-TRICOM ( PANVAC-F ) vaccine subcutaneously ( SC ) intradermally ( ID ) day 28 , 56 , 84 . - Arm II : Patients receive PANVAC-V SC day 1 PANVAC-F SC day 28 , 56 , 84 .
